attributes.action: Allow Citizens of the UK the right to defend themselves from trespassers on their property, and any injury caused to the trespasser in the name of self defence shall not be prosecutable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is getting past a joke, not being able to protect yourself or your family from intruders on your property or actually in your home.  Being worried of picking up a weapon, or even a household object to intimidate the itruder or defend yourself or your family.

It is about time the law was changed and you had the right to defend yourself by any means nessasary.  At the end of the day, no one should enter your home or trespass onto your land without your consent, or else they shall face the consequences.
